meanings.definition: The branch of physics that deals with the behavior of light
meanings.sent1: Studying optics helps us understand how light travels.
meanings.sent2: The scientist specialized in optics to study light behavior.
meanings.sent3: The optics of the situation made it clear who was telling the truth.
meanings.sent4: Her perspective on the issue changed when she learned about the optics of the situation.
meanings.sent5: The optics of the rainbow after the rain were breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The way in which an event or situation is perceived or interpreted
meanings.sent1: The optics of the meeting made it seem more positive than it actually was.
meanings.sent2: His optics on the matter were influenced by his past experiences.
meanings.sent3: The optics of the cat trying to catch its tail were quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The optics of the situation painted a different picture than reality.
meanings.sent5: Her optics on the movie completely changed after watching it again.
